title: Cant download League... Download keeps freezing??
body:
This keeps happening every time I try to download the game. I factory reset my laptop and every time i download it, it gets stuck at a random point even though my internet is fine. it says theres still 6672 mb still left to download. the download is on 58% and im downloading at a rate of 500kbps which is normal for me.

last time it stopped at 17%... like my internet is fine and if i close it and reopen it, the download will start again and idk what to do

replies.body: With a reformat, it's super important to make sure your OS is totally up to date so it has all the necessary products to install.  Your network might also be having an issue specifically holding a strong connection to the patching servers.  It's really important that you leave it alone unless you run into any errors.  Continuously restarting it can run into corruption or other patchiing issues.  Once finished, you can run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.  I hope that helps!
